Name: Gulf Arabic Conversational Telephone Speech
Description: A total of 976 conversation sides from 975 Gulf Arabic speakers are provided (one speaker appears on two distinct calls). Most of the calls contain both sides of a conversation (that is, 450 two-channel recordings plus 76 single-channel recordings). The average duration per side is about 5.7 minutes.
Tasks: speaker identification,speech recognition,spoken dialogue modeling,spoken dialogue systems
